hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "set workspace for building up rpi3 'peripheral-io' package" if [ ! -d tizen_rpi3 ]; then mkdir ./tizen_rpi3 fi
cp /root/samples/rpi3/.gbs.conf ./tizen_rpi3/
cp /root/samples/rpi3/tizen-unified_20191031.1_iot-headed-3parts-armv7l-rpi3.ks ./tizen_rpi3/

echo "clone and checkout 'peripheral-io' package"
cd ./tizen_rpi3
if [ -d peripheral-io ]; then rm ./peripheral-io -rf fi
git clone ssh://review.tizen.org/platform/core/api/peripheral-io

echo "'peripheral-io' package build"
cd ./tizen_rpi3/
gbs build -A armv7l --thread=4 --clean
mic cr loop tizen-unified_20191031.1_iot-headed-3parts-armv7l-rpi3.ks --pack-to=iot-boot-armv7l-rpi3.tar.gz --logfile=mic_build.log -A armv7l
